dmca.title: Urgent
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Geraldine [mailto:gp@guitarprinciples.com] 
Sent: Saturday, June 02, 2007 10:06 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: Urgent

 

To: Legal Response Team

 

In order to substantiate my claim, I thought I would direct you to our
website, which is one of the largest sites for guitar education on the
Web. You can easily see that our entire site is based on our guitar
method, "The Principles of Correct Practice for Guitar"

http://www.guitarprinciples.com/

 

You will further see that we have a section which explains our book,
"The Principles of Correct Practice for Guitar":

http://guitarprinciples.com/Book/further1.htm

 

Our book is one of the most popular guitar methods used throughout the
world.

 

I am again, requesting that you remove the following user from your site
for offering an illegal copy of our book. We do not offer any of our
books as e-books, so "ebookspassion" has scanned our book and made an
electronic copy for sale on your site. I have written to him directly,
with no response.

 

 "The Principles of Correct Practice for Guitar" is available
exclusively through our online Store. No other legal permission has been
given for use or for distributorship, or sale of our intellectual
property.

 

http://www.guitarprinciples.com/cart/

 

The information about the owner is:

Owner: ebookspassion <http://ebookspassion.tradebit.com/contact.php> 
Location: Australia
Member since: 05.10.06 

 

Regards;

 

Geraldine Rapetti

Treasurer

Jamey World, Inc.

for Guitarprinciples.com

PO Box 959

Woodstock, NY 12498

USA

 

 

        ----- Original Message ----- 

        From: Copyright <mailto:copyright@theplanet.com>  

        To: Geraldine <mailto:gp@guitarprinciples.com>  

        Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 

        Sent: Friday, June 01, 2007 5:32 PM

        Subject: RE: Urgent

         

        To Whom It May Concern:

         

        Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice
does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

         

        Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of
your claim.

         

        Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

         

        Legal Response Team

        THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

         

         

        
________________________________


        From: Geraldine [mailto:gp@guitarprinciples.com] 
        Sent: Friday, June 01, 2007 12:13 PM
        To: Copyright
        Subject: Urgent

         

        To Andrea

         

        One of the sites that you are hosting is in copyright violation,
not only in regard to our book, "The Principles of Correct Practice for
Guitar", but for many others, as well.

         

        We request that you immediately remove this website. 

        http://www.tradebit.com/

         

        Here is the link to the page for download of our book:

        http://www.tradebit.com/filedetail.php/1125642

         

        The information about the owner is:

        Owner: ebookspassion
<http://ebookspassion.tradebit.com/contact.php> 
        Location: Australia
        Member since: 05.10.06 

         

        There is no email address, however, this page will lead you to
write to the owner:

        http://www.tradebit.com/interact.php/1125642/complain

         

        Please consider this matter urgent. Thank you in advance.

         

        Geraldine Rapetti

        Treasurer

        Jamey World, Inc.

        for Guitarprinciples.com

        PO Box 959

        Woodstock, NY 12498

        USA

         

        Attached is the copyright page to our book.

        Best regards;
        Geraldine
        www.guitarprinciples.com
